Title: Silent Crickets â€“ Part 2
Content: Shortly after the discovery of flatwing crickets on the island of Kauai, silent crickets were discovered on the nearby island of Oahu. The map shows the location of the islands, and the table shows the year in which flatwing male crickets were first observed and the measured allele frequency in 2012.
The researchers performed a morphological analysis of wild type and flatwing flies from Kauai and Oahu and determined that the wing phenotypes are different between the two islands.
